body:
This staff is made of a rust-colored metal that has been corroded by acid, with a sickly green gem at its tip. The staff allows use of the following spells:

  • Corrosive touch (1 charge)
  • Acid arrow (2 charges)
  • Acid fog (3 charges)
name: Staff of Acid
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Staves/Staff of Acid
